page.title: 19ST. Aloysius Catholic Church
page.content: My name is Terence Pippin. I go to St.Aloysius School.It is a catholic school.Nearby is our church. It is a modern building with large windows,it is very pretty.There are gardens around the church.The parish priest is Father Pierce Maher who is Irish and has been in charge of the church since it opened in 1977.There is a house attached to the church for the priest.The church is built from yellow bricks and is one of the nicest buidings in the area. I am writing about 16th.June 1985.On this day we celebrated the feast of Corpus Christi a very important day in the catholic church.I took part in a large procession through the town.It was really warm and I was glad to change back into my old clothes. Back at home my parents were decorating so I helped them scrape the walls.
